Happy holidays to you: photos and comments are here!
text: Happy holidays to you: photos and comments are here!

texts.html: Dec 20th

We’ve been promising this all year and really hustled to get it out for the holidays. So, without further ado, our holiday gift to you: foursquare just became more useful and social with the addition of photos and comments. (It’s in the app store now! You can also see these new features on foursquare.com)
text: We’ve been promising this all year and really hustled to get it out for the holidays. So, without further ado, our holiday gift to you: foursquare just became more useful and social with the addition of photos and comments. (It’s in the app store
! You can also see these new features on

texts.html: You’ve been requesting these features for months, and there are some cool aspects that you’ll notice right away:
text: You’ve been requesting these features for months, and there are some cool aspects that you’ll notice right away:

texts.html: Comments make meeting up and exploring so much easier. Improve your day by telling a friend that you’re around the corner and they should swing by. And getting a last-minute comment reminding you to order the best dish saves your meal. (You can even comment on the website and from check-in links posted to Facebook and Twitter!)
text: Comments make meeting up and exploring so much easier. Improve your day by telling a friend that you’re around the corner and they should swing by. And getting a last-minute comment reminding you to order the best dish saves your meal. (You can even comment on the website and from check-in links posted to Facebook and Twitter!)

texts.html: Tips with photos changes everything. See dishes before ordering them, figure out if a venue looks fun, or easily identify a hard-to-find spot. More info = better exploration.
text: Tips with photos changes everything. See dishes before ordering them, figure out if a venue looks fun, or easily identify a hard-to-find spot. More info = better exploration.

texts.html: The past comes to life. You can visit your history page on foursquare.com to see all the places you’ve been, with photos and comments preserved. Remembering is more fun than ever.
text: The past comes to life. You can visit your
page on foursquare.com to see all the places you’ve been, with photos and comments preserved. Remembering is more fun than ever.

texts.html: We’ve had a ton of fun testing this. A couple notes:
text: We’ve had a ton of fun testing this. A couple notes:

texts.html: Be sure your iPhone has foursquare push notifications turned on so you’ll know when your friends leave you a comment.
text: Be sure your iPhone has foursquare
turned on so you’ll know when your friends leave you a comment.

texts.html: Photos on check-ins are only visible to your friends (and the networks you share to, like Facebook and Twitter). Tip and venue photos are open to the community. And, as you’d expect, comments are only visible to your friends.
text: Photos on check-ins are only visible to your friends (and the networks you share to, like Facebook and Twitter). Tip and venue photos are open to the community. And, as you’d expect, comments are only visible to your friends.

texts.html: A few of our partners have done an amazing job getting the new photos feature integrated for today. Photos from Instagram pushed to foursquare will now be check-ins with photos (rather than just check-ins). Sightings on Foodspotting will be check-ins with your food photos. And picplz is the first service to allow check-in photos on both iPhone and Android. Soon to follow: we’ve got the new foursquare for Android coming later this week, WebOS (thanks to @zhephree) and BlackBerry in January, and the rest of the major platforms in early 2011. And the API will be ready for all developers later this week!

texts.html: There are a couple features we weren’t able to fit in for this release but we’re working to launch soon. These include sharing photos (to Facebook and Flickr), an easier way to keep track of all the comments you’re getting, and a more useful place to store all your old photos (right now, it’s all on that history page). Stay tuned for those!

texts.html: In the meantime, enjoy photos and comments, and have fun out there!
text: In the meantime, enjoy photos and comments, and have fun out there!

texts.html: Posted in Blog Foursquare iPhone

Foursquare is a free app that helps you and your friends make the most of where you are. Share and save your experiences at the places you visit and get personalized recommendations for where to go.

Check here for the latest updates, tips, and Foursquare happenings!
